sentences.en: A fairly distinct alignment was already evident by midsummer of 1919.
sentences.cn: 到1919年仲夏,阵容已相当明显.

sentences.en: Have they read A Midsummer Night's Dream?
sentences.cn: 他们到底看没看过《仲夏夜之梦》?

sentences.en: In midsummer every town is impossibly crowded.
sentences.cn: 仲夏时节，每个城市都出奇地拥挤。

sentences.en: It is particularly difficult to bear up against the midsummer heat.
sentences.cn: 仲夏酷暑尤其令人难熬.

sentences.en: Midsummer heat closed over the city.
sentences.cn: 这座城市处在盛夏的炎热之中.

sentences.en: Midsummer heat is closing over the city.
sentences.cn: 这座城市正处于炎热的盛夏之中.

sentences.en: Midsummer morning, in this year 1492 , was not less bright than usual.
sentences.cn: 一四九二年这一年的仲夏清晨, 跟平时一样明媚.

sentences.en: Poetically, Midsummer's Eve begins in flowers and ends in fire.
sentences.cn: 仲夏节是富有诗意的节日,它以鲜花领航, 在篝火旁完美落幕.

sentences.en: The old aged cannot bear up against the midsummer heat this year.
sentences.cn: 老年人不胜忍受今年的仲夏酷暑.

sentences.en: This midsummer has plenitude of fruits and vegetables.
sentences.cn: 这个仲夏水果和蔬菜丰富。

sentences.en: We could hear the shrill of the midsummer cricket.
sentences.cn: 我们可以听到仲夏时节蟋蟀的尖叫声.

sentences.en: We use to go for a midnight swim during the midsummer.
sentences.cn: 从前盛夏时我们常在午夜去游泳.

sentences.en: We use to go for a midnight walk during the midsummer.
sentences.cn: 从前盛夏时我们常在午夜去散步.

phrases.tran_cn: 仲夏夜之梦（威廉·莎士比亚的喜剧作品）
